title: Egg Casserole Recipes For Breakfast
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
There are so many ways to enjoy breakfast, there isn’t a reason for the first meal of the day to be boring. If you’re looking for ways to change up your breakfast, here are a few easy casserole recipes to try out.

  1. Sausage and Egg Casserole

This sausage and egg casserole is a hearty meal to start your day. For the recipe, you’ll need one pound of bulk pork sausage, six large Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, two cups of 2% milk, one teaspoon of salt, one teaspoon of ground mustard, six slices of white bread, and one cup shredded cheese.

You’ll need to brown and crumble the sausage in a skillet, drain, and set aside. Then, beat eggs into a large bowl; add milk, salt, and mustard; and stir in bread cubes, cheese, and sausage.

Pour the mixture into a greased 11x7 baking dish and bake uncovered at 350℉ for 40 minutes.

View the full recipe.

  1. Spicy Egg Bake

Give your day a kick with this spicy breakfast dish. The main ingredients in this recipe are Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, taco meat, crescent rolls, cheddar cheese, and Monterey Jack cheese. To raise the heat, add in a cup of salsa.

View the full recipe.

  1. Cheesy Vegetable Egg Dish

This dish is the perfect blend of eggs, veggies, and cheese. For the recipe, you’ll need a zucchini, onion, mushroom, green pepper, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, cottage cheese, and Monterey Jack cheese.

View the full recipe.

  1. BLT Egg Bake

Craving BLT? This egg bake is a breakfast spin on the classic recipe. You’ll need mayonnaise, bread, American cheese, bacon strips, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, 2% milk, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, tomato, cheddar cheese, green onions, and shredded lettuce.

View the full recipe.

  1. Spanakopita Casserole

Enjoy a taste of Greece with this spanakopita casserole. To make the dish, you’ll need 4% cottage cheese, spinach, feta cheese, all-purpose flour, pepper, salt, and Chino Valley Ranchers eggs. 

Start by preheating the oven to 350℉ and combining the cottage cheese, spinach, and feta cheese in a large bowl. Then, stir in the flour, pepper, and salt. Beat in the eggs and mix well.

Pour into a greased 9-in baking dish and bake uncovered for one hour.

View the full recipe.
